SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.server

Class Server

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.server.Server
public class Server extends Object
Server class is the main class of the server side of the application. It contains all the information about the games and the players connected to the server. It also contains the methods to create and join games, to reconnect players and to remove games and players.

  • Constructor Details

    • Server

      public Server()
      Constructor of the class. It initializes the server controller and the maps and lists of the games and the players. Then starts the server.

  • Method Details

    • startServer

      public void startServer()
      Starts the server.

    • login

      public void login(Connection client)
      Method to log in a player. Then it creates a new game if there are no games waiting for players.
      Parameters:
      client - is the connection of the player that wants to log in.

    • startPing

      public void startPing(Connection client)
      Method to start the ping of a player.
      Parameters:
      client - is the connection of the player that wants to start the ping.

    • setClient

      public void setClient(Connection c, String u)
      Method to store the connection of a player in the server.
      Parameters:
      c - is the connection of the player.
      u - is the username of the player.

    • usernameTaken

      public boolean usernameTaken(String username)
      Method to check if a username is already taken.
      Parameters:
      username - is the username to check.
      Returns:
      true if the username is already taken, false otherwise.

    • userNotDisconnected

      public boolean userNotDisconnected(String username, int gameId)
      Method to check if a game contains a disconnected player with a certain username.
      Parameters:
      username - is the username of the player to check.
      gameId - is the id of the game to check.
      Returns:
      true if the game contains the disconnected player with that username, false otherwise.

    • createLobby

      public void createLobby(String username, int numPlayers)
      Method to create a new game.
      Parameters:
      username - is the username of the player that creates the game.
      numPlayers - is the number of players that the game will have.

    • joinLobby

      public void joinLobby(String username, int indexGame)
      Method to join a game.
      Parameters:
      username - is the username of the player that wants to join the game.
      indexGame - is the index of the game in the list of the games waiting for players that the player wants to join.

    • getClientFromName

      public Connection getClientFromName(String name)
      Method that returns a certain client from the map of the clients.
      Parameters:
      name - is the username of the client we want to take.
      Returns:
      the connection of the client with the username passed as parameter.

    • addDisconnectedPlayer

      public void addDisconnectedPlayer(String username, Controller game)
      Add the player to the list of the disconnected players and the game to the list of the games with disconnections.
      Parameters:
      username - is the username of the player that disconnected.
      game - is the game where the player disconnected.

    • reconnectPlayer

      public void reconnectPlayer(Connection client, String username)
      Method to reconnect a player to a game.
      Parameters:
      client - is the connection of the player that wants to reconnect.
      username - is the username of the player that wants to reconnect.

    • removePlayers

      public void removePlayers(String username)
      Method to remove a player from the server.
      Parameters:
      username - is the username of the player that wants to be removed.

    • removeGame

      public void removeGame(Controller game)
      Method to remove a game from the server.
      Parameters:
      game - is the game that wants to be removed.

    • removeStartingGame

      public void removeStartingGame(Controller game)
      Method to remove a game from the list of the starting games.
      Parameters:
      game - is the game that wants to be removed.
